title: Clock Simple Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Clock Simple plugin - displays time and date on the LED matrix

enabled.description: Enable or disable the clock plugin

display_duration.description: How long to display the clock in seconds

live_priority.description: Enable live priority takeover when plugin has live content

high_performance_transitions.description: Use high-performance transitions (120 FPS) instead of standard (30 FPS)

update_interval.description: How often to update the clock display in seconds

timezone.description: Timezone for the clock display (e.g., 'America/New_York', 'Europe/London'). Use IANA timezone database names.

time_format.description: Time format: '12h' for 12-hour format with AM/PM, '24h' for 24-hour format

show_seconds.description: Show seconds in the time display

date_format.description: Date format to display. OLD_CLOCK matches the original clock layout with weekday and month/day with ordinal suffix (e.g., 'Monday, January 1st')

time_color.description: RGB color for the time display [R, G, B]

date_color.description: RGB color for the date display [R, G, B]

ampm_color.description: RGB color for AM/PM indicator [R, G, B]

position_x.description: X position offset for clock display (pixels)

position_y.description: Y position offset for clock display (pixels)

display_style.description: Display style: 'standard' uses text font, 'seven_segment' uses digital segment display

segment_color.description: RGB color for seven-segment display segments [R, G, B]
